Key Match Events: Sunil Chhetri scored a penalty to give India a 1-0 lead in the 38th minute. However, Afghanistan equalized in the 70th minute through Rahmat Akbary and took the lead in the 88th minute through Sharif Mukhammad's penalty.
Post-Match Reflections: Sunil Chhetri's goal was his 94th international goal, making him the first player to score in his first, 25th, 50th, 75th, 100th, 125th, and 150th matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Guwahati, India.
Others: India remained second in Group A of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers after the match and will need to win against Kuwait in June to secure a berth in the third round.
